channel.title: A couple of questions..rep++ for answers!
channel.description:
I have a couple questions..once I have all these questions answered my server will be about 95% ready.
I am using Edge4Pk Client, and source. 317 DELTA
Okay so my first question is,
How do I make it so people can't run through walls and such when they follow a person?
Second,
How do I make it so when you click "rub" on an amulet of glory it brings up a page in your textbox that allows players to pick a area to teleport to?
Third, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,522495.0.html
Rep++ for answers as well as credit in my ::cred command! (Show all players who are given credit for the help or making of OleanPkz)
